sn14.35:4.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn14.35:4.3: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14.35:4.6: yo vāyodhātuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn14.35:4.7: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14.35:5.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn14.35:5.2: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14.35:5.5: yo vāyodhātuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn14.35:5.6: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
